data.name: Goodlands
data.detailed_description:
A game about dinos digging up dinos.

Play as a paleontologist trying to revitalize a decrepit museum by filling it with beautiful fossils straight out the Cretaceous.

FEATURES:
- A cast of cute dinosaur townsfolk
- Discover 20 fully-realized vertebrate fossils
- Discover a total of 300 invertebrate, teeth, and plant fossils
- Drive across a curated open world and explore environments inspired by real-world dig sites
- Uncover the geological history of the region with puzzles
- Discover hidden content and easter eggs!

data.short_description: A dinosaur-themed exploration game. Walk, hop, and drive around a badlands-inspired environment and uncover fossils for your museum collection. A game about dinos digging up dinos.
